gobblin.metrics.reporter.util

Class AvroSerializer<T extends SpecificRecord>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.metrics.reporter.util.AvroSerializer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of avro records that will be serialized.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AvroBinarySerializer, AvroJsonSerializer

    public abstract class AvroSerializer<T extends SpecificRecord>
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Class used for serializing Avro SpecificRecord for metrics reporting.

                               throws IOException
        Get Encoder for serializing Avro records.

      • serializeRecord

        public byte[] serializeRecord(T record)
        Converts a MetricReport to bytes to send through Kafka.

        Actual serialized record will be prepended with a schema version generated by schemaVersionWriter.

        Parameters:
        record - MetricReport to serialize.
        Returns:
        Serialized bytes.
